ClipTo

this is ios app for jumping to another service with the content of clipboard.

View on Github

What’s ClipTo

feature

  • make easy to Google Search with copied words.
  • make easy to Send to Mail with copied words.

How to Use

  • Watch Guideline page

Download

  • Now waiting review in App Store.

for Developer

  • ClipTo is Written by RubyMotion.
  • You can run ClipTo in your iPhone after download source code and build.
